# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = split(text, '\n')
    for i in eachindex(lines)
        line = lines[i]
        if length(line) > text_width
            # find the last space before `text_width`
            idx = findfirst(" ", line, text_width)
            # insert a new line after that space
            if idx !== nothing
                lines[i] = line[1:idx-1] * '\n' * line[idx+1:end]
            end
        end
    end
    return join(lines, '\n')
end

# Example usage:
text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer"
print(wrap_string(text))
```

输出将会是：

```
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
adipiscing elit. Integer
```
